attributes.action: Give the people the power to oust disobedient governments.
attributes.additional_details:
The government are supposed to be the voice of the people, however, all to often the governments of the last thirty years have failed to be the voice of the people, and have instead been the voice of thier own interests, and those of big business.
 To prevent governments acting against the wishes of the people, I propose that the governmnet provide the people of Britain the right to remove from power, those who do not obey the commands of the people without having to wait till the next election.. This is our government, and it ought to act as we direct it to.
